bugs: [Bug] - Fixed a function call in the Media feature. Was trying to log to a function that doesn't exist. Now logs as 'system'. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/148)
[Enhancement] - Updated the refresh rate of admin windows resizing. Should be less noticable now. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/176)
[Bug] - Fixed the admin panel opening on page load when it shouldn't have been. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/175)
[Bug] - Clicking on the Theamus 't' now opens the 'About Theamus' window, even if the admin panel is hidden. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/174)
[Bug] - Fixed the styling of the 'About Theamus' admin window. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/173)
[Bug] - Applied static width and height to the Theamus 't' in the admin panel. Should be better for slower servers now. [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/165)
[Feature] - Show page load information like time and query count! [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/helllomatt/Theamus/issues/153)
